user_story: As a freelancer with variable income, I want flexible account options in the banking system so that I can choose the features that best suit my financial needs.
generated_ac:
1. The system shall allow the user to select and customize account options based on their financial needs.
2. The system shall provide clear feedback to the user upon the completion of each action taken.
3. The system shall validate all user inputs and display specific error messages for invalid entries.
4. The system shall ensure stability by handling exceptional cases without crashing or losing data.

final_ac:

3. The system shall display a configurable list of available account features that users can choose from.
4. The system shall allow users to add or remove specific features to their selected account type.
